Posts.Content: Hey Jo, You can visit http://www.sodnet.net/cancer/breast-...out-testi.html has quite a bit usefull information on breast cancer, and cancer in general. Hope this helps. Best wishes to you and your family.
Posts.Title: Radiation Treatment Questions

Posts.Content: First off Im sorry to hear the sad new about your mom. The only thing I can suggest is to be loving, supportive, and understanding. I really dont know what else to say, only that I hope for the best for you and your loved ones. Best Wishes.
Posts.Title: Help me cope to help my mother and family
